ygData.subject: Questioning From the Vok
ygData.msgSnippet: Cyber Claw: Cyber Claw was lifted from the ground by the wires, held by her arms, legs and waist. Something shocked her. She hissed and screamed at the same

Subject: Questioning From the Vok
Message-ID: <8rbf41+7j20@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

From: wilddance_mare@...

Cyber Claw:





Cyber Claw was lifted from the ground by the wires, held by her arms, 
legs and waist. Something shocked her. She hissed and screamed at the 
same time. But the scream didn't last long. 

She opened her red optics again, sneering as she looked around. Below 
on the ground was markings that wasn't of any race she knew of. She 
had seen it before at certain artifacts. She just didn't know what 
they ment.

Someone's head and face flashed in her mind. Cyber Claw hissed and 
shook her head. It appeared again. It was a male face, ancent 
looking, with horns on the side of the head. The optics were dark. 
The face kept steady behind her optics until he was constantly there. 

She wondered.

"Are you Unicron?" She had heard of tales.

"Yes," the burly voice of the head replied. "I speak for the Vok."

"The Vok?" she asked.

"You are of the decendant of the Decepticons," he said.

Cyber Claw hissed. "I'm not a decendant. I'm a genetic creation. Line 
means nothing to me."

"Either way, you are of the Beast Wars."

"Was," she corrected him with a snarling voice. "I quit Megatron. I 
quit the war! I am for my free self."

"A free agent," Unicron breathed. "This will serve us well."

Cyber Claw spat. "I serve no one! I serve myself until I am nothing 
left but madness. Which I beleive I have already become. I am sister 
to The Wild."

"An invader that serves this planet. How interesting. You may become 
a canidate for our project."

"Project? What Project?"

"To rid of both Predacon and Maximal race that threaten this planet 
with their wars." Cyber Claw listened carefully. It was true. Her 
forest was burt down because of the Predacons. 

"Oh." She closed her optics. "I want something out of this. I want a 
favor." There was a pause. "If I fail, or when your project is done, 
I want you to kill me. I have a past that haunts me and I cannot deal 
with it no longer."

"Then you shall be relieved," Unicron said. "There is one piece of 
information we must find that remains at the fringe. There was a 
Predacon that was chosen to be our servent. Find the truth of his 
demise. The creature had power and armor that had potential to aid 
our Project."

Cyber Claw blinked. "Well, who---" She was cut off when flashes of 
images of a small young Predacon male went across her head. He had a 
strange build, a slim bluish green and gold face. He had a heavy 
chest, mismatched arms, large feet, and almost chilling wide optics. 
A strange beast mode that fit him. A scorpion with a tail of a cobra. 

Voices of females called out a name: Quickstrike. It were calls for 
distress, looking for each other to find him.

She shook her head. "All right. Anything to destroy my worthless 
life." The wires let go, and she landed on her hands and feet into 
the ground. She looked up. All was quiet. She frowned with her harsh 
face and walked into the section where she was first grabbed. On the 
stalactmites, faces of bots and some full figures were shown. A few 
she recalled. She remembered Terrorsaur's, Rattrap's, Cheetor's, 
Dinobot's reformated body, even Megatron. 

She blinked.
